metadata.title: CVE-2019-5834 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Blink in Google Chrome prior to75.0.3770.80 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
